Create EclipseLocator Eclipse_CONASAT6;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.Spacecraft = CONASAT6;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.Filename = 'CONASAT6_ecl.txt';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.OccultingBodies = {Earth, Luna};
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.InputEpochFormat = 'TAIModJulian';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.InitialEpoch = '21545';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.StepSize = 10;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.FinalEpoch = '21545.138';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.UseLightTimeDelay = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.UseStellarAberration = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.WriteReport = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.RunMode = Automatic;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.UseEntireInterval = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT6.EclipseTypes = {'Umbra', 'Penumbra', 'Antumbra'};
